name: Ranidaphobia
description:
Ranidaphobia is a short Horrorgame made in under 3 days by me for the Mini Gamejam 106: Frogs. It was really fun making this game and I learned a lot while making it. 

Please keep in mind that I started programming two weeks ago so it's not perfect and might contain some bugs. If you find bugs or you want to contact me then please via Discord: Bambler#3541

HOW TO OPEN GAME

When you downloaded the game, extract the zip file and open the .exe, that should do it. 

MAC VERSION COMING SOON
